metadata.title: CVE-2020-25678 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in ceph in versions prior to 16.y.z where ceph stores mgrmodule passwords in clear text. This can be found by searching the mgr logsfor grafana and dashboard, with passwords visible.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25678` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 12.2.13-0ubuntu0.18.04.8
